snippet.title: Allocation (2018) - Playthrough
snippet.description:
Playhrough de Allocation, un metroidvania experimental desarrollado en el GMTK Game Jam 2018 en el cual uno crea y modifica la estructura del mapa que uno recorre, similar al generador de calabozos incluido como extra en The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening (2019).

"Allocation is a Metroidvania game without a connected world map. Instead, you must create pathways between key points using the rooms that you collect as you explore."
Game: https://mush101.itch.io/allocation
Developer notes: http://matthew-watson.co.uk/games/allocation/
